attributes.action: reverse the proposed 50 per cent tax band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the income tax changes announced in the Chancellor's April 2009 budget speech will do nothing to improve the public finances and threaten Britain's long-term economic prosperity.  Moreover, we believe that it is morally wrong for the government to take a greater share of income than the individual that earned it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
